name: Farkle 10000 - The Dice Game
description:
Play the exciting Farkle 10000 dice game by LITE Games now!

You don’t know how to Farkle, yet? No Problem: the game is super easy to learn which makes it fun right from the start for beginners. With our app you can play the game against computer opponents or jump straight into the online mode and compete with other players from all over the world or challenge your friends.

The app features beautiful design and animations and the controls are straightforward and intuitive – try for yourself! Climb your way up the leaderboards in the multiplayer mode or play offline against different computer opponents – each with their own personality and using different strategies to win.

Features:
- Play online and offline
- Single- and multiplayer mode
- 10 Computer opponents with characteristic playing styles
- Global leaderboards
- High quality design and animation

The app is available in high-quality localizations for the following languages: English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese & Spanish

Farkle, also known as Greed, Zilch or Chicago, is perfect for everyone who loves to play board and puzzle games. If you like games like Yahtzee or Solitaire, you'll love it. Your points get counted automatically and the rules are easy to learn. Have a seat at our virtual table in our Farkle app - play now for free!

If you require help, visit: https://www.lite.games/support/
